Texts.Eng: Great. Did you harvest your crops yet? Do that, if not. Also, take these ^orange;Bottles^reset; for the next step.

Texts.Chs: 接下来，你需要制作^orange;酵母水^reset;。使用^orange;水^reset;和^orange;小麦^reset;在^orange;糖化桶^reset;里发酵出3份^orange;瓶装酵母^reset;。用^orange;糖^reset;和^orange;瓶装酵母^reset;在^orange;糖化桶^reset;中制作出^orange;酵母水^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Next, you'll need to make ^orange;Yeast Water^reset;. Use ^orange;Water^reset; and ^orange;Wheat^reset; in the ^orange;Mashing Tun^reset; to make 3 ^orange;Grain Water^reset;. Use ^orange;Sugar^reset; with the ^orange;Grain Water^reset; in the ^orange;Mashing Tun^reset; to make ^orange;Yeast Water^reset;.
